title: ECB’s Panetta Says Tariffs Have Damaged the US More Than Others
description: The US economy has borne most of the burden of tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.
content: The US economy has borne most of the burden of tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.
